description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the workspace codebase. Check for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities, dependency issues, hardcoded secrets, and insecure configurations.
context: Production codebase that needs security review before deployment. Focus on authentication flows, database queries, API input validation, and dependency vulnerabilities.
expected_output: Detailed security report with findings categorized by severity (critical/warning/info), specific file/line references, and concrete remediation steps for each finding.
